text:
saM tvA# nahyAmiq paya#sA GRuqtEnaq saM tvA# nahyAmyaqpa OSha#dhIBiH | 
saM tvA# nahyAmi praqjayAq&hamaqdya sA dI$kShiqtA sa#navOq vAja#maqsmE || 
praituq brahma#NaqspatnIq vEdiqM ~MvarNE#na sIdatu | 
athAqhama#nukAqminIq svE lOqkE viqSA iqha || 
suqpraqjasa#stvA vaqya(gm) suqpatnIqrupa# sEdima | 
agnE# sapatnaqdamBa#naqmada#bdhAsOq adA$ByaM || 
iqmaM ~MviShyA#miq varu#Nasyaq pASaqM - [  ]   19
